mapper.select: select p.p_num, p_thumb_img1, p_name, p_price, p_point, m_num, ca_amount from product_tb p , payment_cart_tb c where c.m_num = #{param1} and c.p_num = p.p_num order by c.ca_sysdate asc

select * from (select rownum, mcou.* from (select a.ci_num, a.m_num, a.co_num, a.ci_issue_day, a.ci_end_day, b.co_name, b.co_start_day, b.co_end_day, b.co_expiry, b.co_type, b.co_discount, b.co_product, b.co_condition from c_issue_tb a, coupon_tb b where a.m_num=#{param1} and a.co_num=b.co_num order by a.ci_num asc) mcou) order by rownum desc

select * from (select rownum, mcou.* from (select a.ci_num, a.m_num, a.co_num, a.ci_issue_day, a.ci_end_day, b.co_name, b.co_start_day, b.co_end_day, b.co_expiry, b.co_type, b.co_discount, b.co_product, b.co_condition from c_issue_tb a, coupon_tb b where a.m_num=#{param1} and a.co_num=b.co_num and b.co_type = 'cart' order by a.ci_num asc) mcou) order by rownum desc

select * from (select rownum, mcou.* from (select a.ci_num, a.m_num, a.co_num, a.ci_issue_day, a.ci_end_day, b.co_name, b.co_start_day, b.co_end_day, b.co_expiry, b.co_type, b.co_discount, b.co_product, b.co_condition from c_issue_tb a, coupon_tb b where a.m_num=#{param1} and a.co_num=b.co_num and b.co_type = 'delivery' order by a.ci_num asc) mcou) order by rownum desc

select count(*) from (select rownum, mcou.* from (select a.ci_num, a.m_num, a.co_num, a.ci_issue_day, a.ci_end_day, b.co_name, b.co_start_day, b.co_end_day, b.co_expiry, b.co_type, b.co_discount, b.co_product, b.co_condition from c_issue_tb a, coupon_tb b where a.m_num=#{param1} and a.co_num=b.co_num and b.co_type='product' and a.ci_end_day > sysdate order by a.ci_num asc) mcou)

select count(*) from (select rownum, mcou.* from (select a.ci_num, a.m_num, a.co_num, a.ci_issue_day, a.ci_end_day, b.co_name, b.co_start_day, b.co_end_day, b.co_expiry, b.co_type, b.co_discount, b.co_product, b.co_condition from c_issue_tb a, coupon_tb b where a.m_num=#{param1} and a.co_num=b.co_num and b.co_type='cart' and a.ci_end_day > sysdate order by a.ci_num asc) mcou)

select count(*) from (select rownum, mcou.* from (select a.ci_num, a.m_num, a.co_num, a.ci_issue_day, a.ci_end_day, b.co_name, b.co_start_day, b.co_end_day, b.co_expiry, b.co_type, b.co_discount, b.co_product, b.co_condition from c_issue_tb a, coupon_tb b where a.m_num=#{param1} and a.co_num=b.co_num and b.co_type='delivery' and a.ci_end_day > sysdate order by a.ci_num asc) mcou)
mapper.update: update member_tb set m_email=#{m_email}, m_zipcode=#{m_zipcode}, m_address1=#{m_address1}, m_address2=#{m_address2}, m_phone=#{m_phone}, m_tel=#{m_tel} where m_num=#{m_num}
mapper.insert: insert into orderlist_tb values(ol_seq.nextval, #{ol_order_num}, #{ol_orderer_id}, #{p_num}, #{ol_amt}, #{co_num}, ((select p_price from product_tb where p_num=#{p_num})-(select co_discount from coupon_tb where co_num=#{co_num})), #{ol_payment}, sysdate, null, default)
